comment: Start TorQ connection management
Start STP
Wait for proc to start
Open STP handle
Get location of log directory
Wait for connections to get set up
Creating HDB directory
Start WDB, HDB, GW and IDB
Wait for procs to start
Open WDB handle
Open IDB handle
Open GW handle
Set low treshold numbers for merging

code: neg[gwHandle](`.gw.asyncexec;"select from trade where date=.z.D";`idb);0~count gwHandle[]
comment: Check if trade table initialised correctly with 0 rows
Send trade and quote updates to STP
Wait for updates to get published

code: neg[gwHandle](`.gw.asyncexec;"select from trade where date=.z.D, sym=`GOOG";`idb);5~count gwHandle[]
comment: Check trade update was correctly published

code: neg[gwHandle](`.gw.asyncexec;"select from quote_iex where date=.z.D";`idb);0~count gwHandle[]
comment: Check if table that not have been published has 0 rows
Trigger EOD on WDB
Wait for merge to HDB to happen

code: neg[gwHandle](`.gw.asyncexec;"select from trade where sym in `GOOG";`hdb);5~count gwHandle[]
comment: Check if HDB has the merged data

code: 0=sum idbHandle@/: {raze ("count select from ";x)} each string wdbHandle(`.wdb.tablelist;())
comment: Check if all tables have been correctly initilised with 0 rows after eod trigger

code: neg[gwHandle](`.gw.asyncexec;"select from trade where date=.z.D+1";`idb);0~count gwHandle[]
comment: Check if IDB has been emptied.
Send trade and quote updates to STP
Wait for updates to get published

code: neg[gwHandle](`.gw.asyncexec;"select from trade where date=.z.D+1, sym=`GOOG";`idb);5~count gwHandle[]
comment: Check trade update was correctly published
Publish some new data to the tickplant with new symbol
Wait for updates to get published

code: neg[gwHandle](`.gw.asyncexec;"select from trade where date=.z.D+1, sym=`round2";`idb);10~count gwHandle[]
comment: Check if IDB was reloaded and is aware if the new symbol
Check if row counts in IDB was reloaded correctly
Close handles
Stop all procs
Delete test segmented tickerplant logs
Delete temp HDB
Delete temp WDB
